text: James Ernest Oakley (10 November 1901 – 1972) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back for Sunderland. He had 5 children. Billy, Priscilla, Phillip, Stuart and Helen. He was married to Elizabeth Wood before his death. ==References== Category:1901 births Category:1972 deaths Category:People from Tynemouth Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Seaton Delaval F.C. players Category:Blyth Spartans A.F.C. players Category:Sunderland A.F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Northampton Town F.C. players Category:Kettering Town F.C. players Category:Birtley F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: James Oakley (footballer)
